span.p:
Metrics:
├─ WAL generation rate
├─ Replication slot lag
├─ Network throughput
└─ Transaction rate

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Metrics:
├─ WAL receive lag
├─ WAL apply lag
├─ Recovery delay
└─ Last WAL received time

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Critical Alerts:
├─ Cross-region lag > 10s
├─ Replication broken
├─ Primary region down
├─ Secondary region down
└─ Network partition

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Cross-Region Health:
├─ Network latency
├─ Bandwidth utilization
├─ WAL shipping delay
├─ Replication slot size
└─ Data lag (bytes/time)
